sentences.en: Do you swear on your honour (= promise very strongly ) that you will never tell anyone?
sentences.cn: 你能以你的名誉发誓绝不告诉任何人吗？

sentences.en: Don’t swear in front of the children.
sentences.cn: 不要在孩子们面前说粗话。

sentences.en: He has been brought up not to swear in front of women.
sentences.cn: 他从小就被教育不要在女性面前说脏话。

sentences.en: He swears by his personal physician.
sentences.cn: 他很信任他的私人医生

sentences.en: He swore by all the angels and saints of heaven.
sentences.cn: 我以天堂中所有的天使和圣人的名义起誓

sentences.en: his informant swore blind that the weapons were still there.
sentences.cn: 他的线人一口咬定说武器还在那里。

sentences.en: I could kill you! I swear I could!
sentences.cn: 我想杀了你！我发誓我真想杀了你！

sentences.en: I don't know anything about what happened, I swear.
sentences.cn: 我发誓, 我对所发生的事一无所知.

sentences.en: I never touched her, I swear to God .
sentences.cn: 我从未碰过她，我敢向上帝起誓。

sentences.en: I never touched your purse, I swear!
sentences.cn: 我绝对没有碰过你的钱包，我发誓！

sentences.en: I swear by God I didn't mean it.
sentences.cn: 我对上帝发誓我不是这个意思.

sentences.en: I swear he's a swindler.
sentences.cn: 我肯定他是个骗子.

sentences.en: I swear I've told you all I know.
sentences.cn: 我发誓我已经把我所知道的全都告诉你了。

sentences.en: I think it was about ten o’clock when we left, but I couldn’t swear to it (= I am not certain ) .
sentences.cn: 我想我们离开时大约10点，但我不能肯定。

sentences.en: I think she said she was going to the library, but I couldn't swear by it.
sentences.cn: 我想她说过要去图书馆，但我不肯定

sentences.en: I used to get very upset and scream and swear, throwing tantrums all over the place.
sentences.cn: 以前，我动不动就发脾气，大喊大叫，还骂人。

sentences.en: It is totally unacceptable for children to swear.
sentences.cn: 孩子说脏话是完全不能容忍的。

sentences.en: It's wrong to swear and shout.
sentences.cn: 破口大骂是不对的.

sentences.en: Many people swear by vitamin C's ability to ward off colds.
sentences.cn: 许多人深信维生素C能预防感冒。

sentences.en: Presidents must swear allegiance to the US constitution.
sentences.cn: 总统必须宣誓效忠美国宪法。

sentences.en: Remember that you have sworn an oath and so must tell the truth.
sentences.cn: 记住你已经宣过誓了，所以必须讲真话。

sentences.en: Say that again, but this time leave out the swear - words.
sentences.cn: 再说一遍, 但这次省去那些诅咒语.

sentences.en: She has sworn off cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 她已保证戒掉香烟

sentences.en: Soldiers must swear allegiance to the King.
sentences.cn: 战士们必须对国王宣誓效忠.

sentences.en: swear in a mayor.
sentences.cn: 使市长宣誓就职

sentences.en: The police are the only civil servants who have to swear allegiance to the Crown.
sentences.cn: 警察是唯一要宣誓效忠君主的公务员。

sentences.en: We swear to collect this blood debt.
sentences.cn: 我们誓死要报这血海深仇!

sentences.en: Why do you swear? It's really bad.
sentences.cn: 你怎么骂人,多难听!

phrases.tran_cn: 咒骂，诅咒：以肮脏、激烈或亵渎的语言辱骂；诅咒
硬把黑的说成是白的，固执谬见，强词夺理
经宣誓保证属实后而获得（逮捕令）
(美律)经宣誓保证所控属实后发给（拘捕证）

trans.tran_cn: 咒骂，郑重承诺，发誓，肯定地说，使发誓
trans.tran_en: to make a public official promise, especially in a court of law
to promise that you will do something
to say very strongly that what you are saying is true
